helpDialog.helpDialogFirstStep: 1. Select a number in the Dropdown.
helpDialog.helpDialogSecStep: 2. Click the "Generate" button to generate the password.
helpDialog.helpDialogThirdStep:
3. Now click the "Copy" button to copy the password
 into your clipboard.

aboutDialog.aboutDialogText:
The KD Password Generator is a simple desktop application to generate a random password between 8 and 20 characters.

This application is completely free software.

copyDialog.copyDialogText: Your password has been successfully copied.

exitDialog.exitDialogText: Do you want to exit the program?

messageDialog.messageDialogText: Please select a number to generate a password.
